text: @senrobportman @realDonaldTrump Rob, lay off the Cool-Aid. How can you call Pence's appointment as coronavirus czar "aggressive & proactive"? Mike Pence is an intellectually-challenged Puritan ~ or maybe the Torquemada of Indiana ~ who exacerbated the HIV epidemic there by cutting prevention & testing services.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
